Intensive English will prepare students to learn through a number of different academic contexts. Students can expect to learn through in-class lectures and discussions, however if COVID conditions worsen, the university might require us to conduct classes online. Students granted official online allowance from the university will attend class virtually, through Zoom, and/or on-demand video. Through group and pair-work, students should plan on doing projects and presentations.
